TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataObjectPastingEventArgs extends System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataObjectPastingEventArgs (System.Windows.IDataObject dataObject, bool isDragDrop, string formatToApply);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.IDataObject dataObject, bool isDragDrop, string formatToApply) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> containing the data to be pasted.

A `Boolean` value indicating whether the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation. `true` to indicate that the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, `false`. If this parameter is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event is fired on drop.
A string specifying the preferred data format to use for the paste operation. See the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataFormats"> class for a set of predefined data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs> object is typically created by the application that is initiating the paste operation.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a suggested <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> to use for the paste operation.
Docs.value:
The currently suggested <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> to use for the paste operation.
Getting this value returns the currently suggested <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> for the paste operation.
Setting this value specifies a new suggested <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> to use for the paste operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Initially this property contains a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> that is identical to that stored in the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A> property. Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> to paste by setting this property.
A <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> property when this property is set.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string specifying the suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Docs.value:
A string specifying the suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Getting this value returns the currently suggested data format to use for the paste operation.
Setting this value specifies a new suggested data format to use for the paste operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a copy of the original data object associated with the paste operation.
Docs.value: A copy of the original data object associated with the paste operation.
